com.google.enterprise.connector.spi
Interface AuthorizationManager

public interface AuthorizationManager

Authorization Manager. All calls related to authorizing particular users to see particular documents pass through this interface.

Method Summary
 ResultSet authorizeDocids(java.util.List docidList, java.lang.String username)
          Gets authorization from the repository for a set of documents by ID.
 ResultSet authorizeTokens(java.util.List tokenList, java.lang.String username)
          Deprecated.  
 

Method Detail

authorizeDocids

public ResultSet authorizeDocids(java.util.List docidList,
                                 java.lang.String username)
                          throws RepositoryException
Gets authorization from the repository for a set of documents by ID.

Parameters:
docidList - The document set represented as a list of Strings: the docid for each document. The docid strings which the connector manager will pass in should have come from the search appliance, from documents that this connector submitted for indexing via traversal. Thus the docids should have started as SpiConstants.PROPNAME_DOCID properties that were part of an ResultSet returned from a QueryTraversalManager.startTraversal or QueryTraversalManager.resumeTraversal call.
username - The username as a string
Returns:
A ResultSet where each PropertyMap has a String property SpiConstants.PROPNAME_DOCID with a document ID from the list, and a boolean property SpiConstants.PROPNAME_AUTH_VIEWPERMIT that indicates whether this user can view this document. This result set should contain an element for each document id supplied, but does not need to be in the same order as the docidList.
Throws:
RepositoryException

authorizeTokens

public ResultSet authorizeTokens(java.util.List tokenList,
                                 java.lang.String username)
                          throws RepositoryException
Deprecated.  

Gets authorization from the repository for a set of documents by token.

Parameters:
tokenList -
username -
Returns:
A ResultSet
Throws:
RepositoryException
